actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for outpatient surgery.

summary.text: Authorizes, under title XVIII of the Social Security Act (Health Insurance for the Aged), the payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for outpatient surgery.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for outpatient surgery.
